doc.field: Series VII is made up of the contents of binders and folders that variously comprised scripts, notes, cues, contact sheets, schedules, and the like, usually heavily annotated, often compiled by a stage manager or director, for use during production of a play. Several Mabou Mines' productions, and some Mabou Mines-affiliated productions, are represented. Some folders contain scripts the company did not file with those scripts that make up Series VI. There is also significant overlap with Series III: Production Files. Of particular interest are the contents of binders used by JoAnne Akalaitis during production of the Dead End Kids film.
